name: ENVS 19
title: Topics in Natural History
description: Students learn the fundamentals of organismal biology and ecology through observations in the field, museum specimens, and field journaling. Class focuses on a particular taxonomic group or natural community, such as reptiles, fungi, insects, coastal prairie, or chaparral. Enrollment by application. Please email envsadvi@ucsc.edu for applications. May be repeated for credit.
class_notes: Students may enroll. No applications and permission numbers are required. This quarter, the course will focus on herpetology.
